Module technology.sola.ecs

Package technology.sola.ecs.view

package technology.sola.ecs.view
This package provides view classes for usage by SolaEcs when querying a World.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    technology.sola.ecs
    This package provides the core classes for sola-ecs.
    technology.sola.ecs.exception
    This package provides various exceptions for errors that may happen during various sola-ecs operations.
    technology.sola.ecs.io
    This package provides the API and some default implementations for serializing and deserializing World.
